page.title: 09BARNS TO HOMES, SCALES.
page.content: Forty years ago there were twelve small farms in Scales, and most of the inhabitants worked in the village itself. To-day only a few people work on the four remaining farms and the majority travel to the nearby towns of Ulverston and Barrow for work main- ly by private car and barns have become homes.
